name: Ragdog
description:
Controls

  • W - Jump (works as long as at least two feet are touching the ground)
  • A - Rotate Body counterclockwise
  • D - Rotate Body clockwise
  • Q - Rotate all legs counterclockwise
  • E - Rotate all legs clockwise

"Story"

You are a very good and a very floppy doggie, and you got out of the house! Fortunately, it is raining treats, because that's convenient to the plot. Catch as many as you can despite being floppy. Either way, you still got out for a great day at the park, so you can't lose!

Credits

LoparPanda - programming, gameplay, graphics

Ruinaerr - music, photos of his glorious Samoyed doggo used to make the main character
